meanings.definition: An area of open land around a city, on which building is restricted.
meanings.sent1: The city council decided to protect the greenbelt from development.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy taking walks in the greenbelt near my neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The greenbelt told the city buildings, 'You shall not pass!'
meanings.sent4: The greenbelt acted as a shield, protecting the city from urban sprawl.
meanings.sent5: The greenbelt was like a green oasis in the midst of the bustling city.

meanings.definition: A strip of grass or trees planted along a road or around a building site.
meanings.sent1: The workers planted a greenbelt along the new highway.
meanings.sent2: The greenbelt around the construction site added a touch of nature to the area.
meanings.sent3: The greenbelt by the road whispered to the passing cars, 'Slow down and enjoy the view.'
meanings.sent4: The greenbelt stood like a guardian, protecting the building site from prying eyes.
meanings.sent5: The greenbelt sparkled in the sunlight, inviting people to take a leisurely stroll.
